login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Enter your password to continue
login.footer: Please contact your administrator if you forgot your password

landing.pageTitle: AgentStudio - AI Agent Platform | Powered by Claude Code
landing.metaDescription: A modern personal agent platform built on Claude Code SDK. Access powerful AI capabilities through an intuitive web interface, supporting multiple LLMs to boost productivity.

hero.title: AI Agent Platform
hero.subtitle: Make AI Your Powerful Assistant
hero.description: A modern personal agent platform built on Claude Code SDK. Access powerful AI capabilities through an intuitive web interface to boost productivity.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Comprehensive Features for Modern AI Workflows

modernWeb.title: Modern Web Interface
modernWeb.description: Professional intuitive Web UI, real-time streaming responses, split-panel design, suitable for developers and general users

multiModel.title: Multi-Model Support
multiModel.description: Support for Claude, OpenAI, GLM, DeepSeek and other LLMs, flexible switching to meet different needs

agentSystem.title: Agent System
agentSystem.description: Built-in professional agents, custom agent creation, message-level tool customization, extensible development framework

fileManagement.title: File Management
fileManagement.description: Built-in file explorer, project-aware operations, version control integration, support for image upload and content preview

professionalTools.title: Professional Tools
professionalTools.description: Slide agents, code explorer, document outline, tool renderer and other professional tools to boost productivity

secureReliable.title: Secure & Reliable
secureReliable.description: Environment variables protect API keys, CORS configuration, input validation, sandboxed file system access to ensure security

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.subtitle: Choose your preferred installation method and start using within minutes
quickStart.endUserDescription: No configuration needed, auto-installs all dependencies, perfect for quick experience and daily use
quickStart.developerDescription: Full development environment, supports hot reload, perfect for custom development and feature extension

cta.title: Ready to start your AI workflow?
cta.subtitle: Join developers and teams using AgentStudio and experience AI-driven productivity

footer.description: Personal agent platform built on Claude Code SDK, make AI your powerful assistant.

agents.subtitle: Manage Specialized AI Agents

memorySettings.title: Global Memory Settings
memorySettings.description: Global memory is shared background information for all AI assistants, including your work preferences, project information, etc.
memorySettings.fileSourceInfo: Content is sourced from the ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md file in your user directory.
memorySettings.placeholder: Write your global memory content here...
memorySettings.infoAutoLoad: Global memory will be automatically loaded in every conversation to provide background information for AI
memorySettings.infoSuggestions: Recommended to include: work preferences, project background, personal information, etc.
memorySettings.saveFailed: Failed to save, please try again

version.title: Version Management
version.subtitle: Manage multiple Claude Code versions, specify executable paths, aliases and environment variables
version.reinitializeSuccess: Configuration has been reset, reloading page
version.clickToAddFirst: Click "Add Version" to configure your first Claude version
version.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete version "{{alias}}"?

currentVersion.title: Current Version
currentVersion.clickToCheck: Click "Check Version" to get version info
currentVersion.info1: Claude Code is an AI programming assistant that supports code generation, editing and project management
currentVersion.info2: Node.js is the fundamental runtime environment for the system
currentVersion.info3: Supports multiple package managers: npm, pnpm, yarn (Priority: pnpm > yarn > npm)
currentVersion.info4: The system will automatically select the preferred package manager for update operations
currentVersion.info5: It is recommended to keep Claude Code up to date for the best experience

templates.description: Select a preset template to quickly configure third-party API providers with auto-filled environment variables
